languages.text: {n}В голосе Паскаля вы слышите эхо иных: тревожные нотки Деменца и ревностные — Тарзуса, задумчивый тон Аксиоманты. Все они сплавляются в новый, исполненный мудрости и уверенности в собственном праве решать — в голос архимагоса Амарната. И голос этот зарождается в устах новых братьев и сестер вашего соратника. Обратив взор к вам, древний техножрец веско произносит:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".

{n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
languages.original_text: {n}В голосе Паскаля вы слышите эхо иных: тревожные нотки Деменца и ревностные — Тарзуса, задумчивый тон Аксиоманты. Все они сплавляются в новый, исполненный мудрости и уверенности в собственном праве решать — в голос архимагоса Амарната. И голос этот зарождается в устах новых братьев и сестер вашего соратника. Обратив взор к вам, древний техножрец веско произносит:{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл".

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's coldness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to make decisions. The voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your comrade-in-arms' new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声に他者の声の響きが混じっていることにあなたは気づく。デメンツの不安、ターザスの熱意、アクシオマンサの悲哀。それらすべてが融合して新しい声となり、導き手としての知性と確信に満ちていた…大賢人アマルナトの声だ。この声が、あなたの仲間の新たな同胞たちを動かす。古い時代を生きた技術司祭は視線をあなたに移し、重々しく口を開いた。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声に他者の声の響きが混じっていることにあなたは気づく。デメンツの不安、ターザスの熱意、アクシオマンサの悲哀。それらすべてが融合して新しい声となり、導き手としての知性と確信に満ちていた…大賢人アマルナトの声だ。この声が、あなたの仲間の新たな同胞たちを動かす。古い時代を生きた技術司祭は視線をあなたに移し、重々しく口を開いた。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}你在帕斯卡的声音中听到了其他声音的回响——德曼兹的焦虑，塔祖斯的热情，阿修曼塔的沉思。他们融为崭新的合音，充满了智慧与信心，坚信阿玛纳特大贤者的引导。这个声音也同样会在你的同伴新的兄弟姐妹的口中回荡。这位古老的技术神甫望向你，庄严地开了口。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}你在帕斯卡的声音中听到了其他声音的回响——德曼兹的焦虑，塔祖斯的热情，阿修曼塔的沉思。他们融为崭新的合音，充满了智慧与信心，坚信阿玛纳特大贤者的引导。这个声音也同样会在你的同伴新的兄弟姐妹的口中回荡。这位古老的技术祭司望向你，庄严地开了口。{/n}“让循环终止吧。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Dans la voix de Pasqal, vous décelez des échos de l'anxiété de Dementz, du zèle de Tarzus et des préoccupations d'Axiomantha. Tous ces traits qui composaient ses autres lui ont désormais fusionné pour ne plus former qu'une seule voix, pleine de sagesse et de confiance dans ses prérogatives : celle de l'archimagos Amarnat, à laquelle les nouveaux frères et sœurs de votre acolyte semblent totalement assujettis. L'ancien technoprêtre se tourne vers vous et ajoute avec gravité :{/n} « Que le Cycle soit interrompu. »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans la voix de Pasqal, vous décelez des échos de l'anxiété de Dementz, du zèle de Tarzus et des préoccupations d'Axiomantha. Tous ces traits qui composaient ses autres lui ont désormais fusionné pour ne plus former qu'une seule voix, pleine de sagesse et de confiance dans ses prérogatives : celle de l'archimagos Amarnat, à laquelle les nouveaux frères et sœurs de votre acolyte semblent totalement assujettis. L'ancien technoprêtre se tourne vers vous et ajoute avec gravité :{/n} « Que le Cycle soit interrompu. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Escuchas ecos de otras voces en la de Pasqal: un atisbo de la ansiedad de Dementz, del fervor de Tarzus, de la meditación de Axiomantha. Todas se fusionan en una nueva voz, llena de sabiduría y confianza en su prerrogativa de liderazgo, la voz del Archimagos Amarnat. Y esta voz se apodera de los labios de los nuevos hermanos y hermanas de tu compañero. El antiguo tecnosacerdote desliza la mirada hacia ti y dice, con solemnidad:{/n} «Que el Ciclo se interrumpa».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Escuchas ecos de otras voces en la de Pasqal: un atisbo de la ansiedad de Dementz, del fervor de Tarzus, de la meditación de Axiomantha. Todas se fusionan en una nueva voz, llena de sabiduría y confianza en su prerrogativa de liderazgo, la voz del Archimagos Amarnat. Y esta voz se apodera de los labios de los nuevos hermanos y hermanas de tu compañero. El antiguo tecnosacerdote desliza la mirada hacia ti y dice, con solemnidad:{/n} «Que el Ciclo se interrumpa».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Du hörst in Pasqals Stimme das Echo anderer Stimmen: ein wenig von Dementz' Unruhe, von Tarzus' Eifer, von Axiomanthas Nachdenklichkeit. Sie alle verschmelzen zu einer neuen Stimme, voller Weisheit und Vertrauen in das Recht, zu führen — zu der Stimme von Erzmagos Amarnat. Und diese Stimme übernimmt die Lippen der neuen Brüder und Schwestern deines Gefährten. Der uralte Techpriester blickt dich an und sagt feierlich:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst in Pasqals Stimme das Echo anderer Stimmen: ein wenig von Dementz' Unruhe, von Tarzus' Eifer, von Axiomanthas Nachdenklichkeit. Sie alle verschmelzen zu einer neuen Stimme, voller Weisheit und Vertrauen in das Recht, zu führen — zu der Stimme von Erzmagos Amarnat. Und diese Stimme übernimmt die Lippen der neuen Brüder und Schwestern deines Gefährten. Der uralte Techpriester blickt dich an und sagt feierlich:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde başkalarının da yankısını duyuyor; Dementz'in kaygısından, Tarzus'un hararetinden, Axiomantha'nın düşünceliliğinden birer parça seziyorsun. Hepsi birleşerek bilgelikle ve onun liderlik etme imtiyazına duydukları güvenle yeni bir ses, Başmagos Amarnat'ın sesini meydana getiriyor. Bu ses, yoldaşının yeni kardeşlerinin dudaklarına hâkim oluyor. Kadim Tekno Rahip, bakışlarını sana çevirip ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear echoes of other voices in Pasqal's: a touch of Dementz's anxiety, of Tarzus's zeal, of Axiomantha's pensiveness. They all fuse into a new voice, full of wisdom and confidence in his prerogative to lead — the voice of Archmagos Amarnat. And this voice takes hold of the lips of your companion's new brothers and sisters. The ancient Tech-Priest turns his gaze toward you and says, with gravitas,{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde başkalarının da yankısını duyabiliyorsun: Dementz'in kaygısından, Tarzus'un hararetinden, Axiomantha'nın düşünceliliğinden birer parça. Hepsi birleşerek, bilgelikle ve onun liderlik etme imtiyazına duydukları güvenle yeni bir ses oluşturuyorlar: Başmagos Amarnat'ın sesini. Ve bu ses, yoldaşının yeni kardeşlerinin dudaklarına hâkim oluyor. Kadim Tekno Rahip bakışlarını sana çeviriyor ve ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor:{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
